import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" const SingleProduct = () => { const param = useParams() let id = param.id const [productDetail, setProductDetails] = useState({}) // find the single product detail const loadData = async () => { const result = await axios(`https://dummyjson.com/products/${id}`) setProductDetails(result.data) } useEffect(() => { loadData() }, [loadData()]) return (
{/* Left half for carousel taking full height of the screen */}
{productDetail.images && productDetail.images.map((photo, index) => (
))}
Previous Next
{/* Right half for product details */}
{productDetail.title}

Price: ${productDetail.price}

Category: {productDetail.category}

Description: {productDetail.description}

Brand: {productDetail.brand}

Rating: {productDetail.rating}

Discount: {productDetail.discountPercentage}%

) } export default SingleProduct
